name: Tampere Lockdown
description:
NB! Some of the features mentioned below such as executing different preventive actions, are not seen in the current prototype.

PLOT
An unknown infectious pathogen appears in Tampere and the player has to, with help of various restrictions, advanced technology and ultimately vaccine, wipe out the infection and save Tampere citizens.

HOW TO PLAY
At the beginning of a new game, player picks up two modifiers that have both positive and negative impact on the game world and its events.
When the disease starts spreading in the Tampere city, player has to execute various preventive actions, quarantines and treatments as well as try to keep citizens' compliance level high.
Player wins the game by developing and distributing a vaccine and curing the still alive citizens. Player fails in their task, if the infection kills everybody before the vaccine is ready.

GAME CONTROLS
WASD to navigate the map
Q and E to rotate the view
Mouse to navigate the menus
